review: I flew Garuda-Indonesia on GA682 from Jakarta to Sorong as it is night flight it leaves Jakarta just after midnight and arrives in Sorong just after 06:10am local time, however the flight duration is approx. 4 hours. At check in I was met by Garuda service Team member Hariyanto, and he helped and assisted me through security and into the lounge. As it is a late-night flight the lounge was not so busy, however there were sufficient snacks and drinks available and there were service team members were on hand if required. The Boarding Gate was No. 24, which is quite some way from the Lounge, therefore Hariyanto arranged for transport to the boarding gate. Upon arrival at the gate, I was able to board straight away. The business class section was full, but there was sufficient baggage space for my carryon luggage. After takeoff I was offered a selection of meals. The meals and drinks were more than sufficient for a flight of approx. 4 hours. The cabin crew were very engaging and helpful throughout the flight, even though they were quite busy with a full business class section. Overall, a good flight considering it is a night flight and short to medium duration.

Flew Garuda Indonesia from Singapore to Jakarta on the early morning flight. Check in is at Terminal-3, however the aircraft departs from Terminal-1 not great, however quite quick to get to Terminal-1 via the inter Terminal Train which takes less than 10 minutes including waiting time. The check in team were quite friendly and helpful and going through immigration in Singapore Changi airport is great as you can use the auto gates. Boarding the aircraft started early and we departed from the gate ahead of schedule and landed in Jakarta 30 minutes ahead schedule. Onboard the flight the service was very good with two the excellent cabin crew members serving us and they were Frida Mersiati and Utami Wigoti. Thank you both for great onboard service and the excellent breakfast meal. Upon arrival in Jakarta, I was meet by Rudy from the PSA Team who helped and assisted me via immigration, baggage collection and through customs out to my car. Great overall service.

My family and I flew on GA-89 from Amsterdam to Jakarta July 2024. We were picked home from our hotel by two cars provided by Garuda-Indonesia. We were taken directly to the VIP center at Schiphol were all check-in, immigration and security formalities were carried out. Within the VIP lounge there are full pre-boarding meals available as well as snacks. When it came time for boarding my family and I were taken directly to the plane by car and were able to board the plane. Upon boarding we were welcomed and taken to our seats were the cabin crew introduced themselves. The team was made up of FSM Chrestian, MDC Yoshi, Chef Prima and Senior FA Sisty and they provided an outstanding service from take-off to landing in Jakarta. They went out of their way to accommodate my daughter’s special meal requirements and were always available throughout the flight. The selection of food onboard was quite extensive. The overall service provided from meals, table service cleanliness of the bathrooms etc. was excellent and my family and I would like to say a big thank to both the cabin crew and Jakarta First Class Team for an outstanding experience. Upon arrival in Jakarta, we were met by the Garuda First Class Team of Vianda and Hilman who escorted us through immigration and helped us get our baggage and then took us out to the two cars provided by Garuda-Indonesia to take us home.

My family and I flew on GA-88 from Jakarta to Amsterdam June 2024. We were picked home from our home by two cars provided by Garuda-Indonesia. At the airport we were met curbside by Garuda First Class support team who helped us check in and escorted us through fast-track security and immigration, then into the First-Class lounge. Within the Garuda First Class lounge there are VIP rooms and my family decided to have the pre-boarding full meal and drink service and the staff were very helpful and the meal was very well presented. Thak you to the First-Class Lounge Team. When it came time for boarding, we were escorted to the aircraft and to our seats by the First-Class Support Team. After we were seated the cabin crew introduced themselves and they give us a very warm welcome. Thank you Budiranti, Irma, Angeline & Deni for outstanding service and for being so engaging to my family and I throughout the flight as this made our flight quite enjoyable. My family and I bedded down a few hours after take-off and after the meal service which was prepared to order by the onboard chef. Throughout the flight the cabin crew were always on hand to serve snacks and drinks. For breakfast, my family and I ordered different meals, and all were served to order by the Chef onboard and were very well presented, there was also an excellent selection of side dishes. Upon arrival in Amsterdam, we were met by the VIP Team who took us to the VIP lounge where we went through immigration. This is an outstanding service provided by Garuda-Indonesia for its First-Class passengers and they also helped with our onwards flights. There is also a full meal service available in the VIP lounge and my children took advantage of this. Thank you, to the Garuda-Indonesia GA88 Team for an outstanding service to my family and me.

I flew Garuda-Indonesia on GA682 from Jakarta to Sorong as the flight is a red eye it leaves Jakarta just after midnight and arrives in Sorong just after 06:00am local time, however the flight duration is just under 4 hours due to the time difference. At check in I was met at the Jakarta airport by Garuda service Team member Ms. Vianda, and she helped and assisted me through security and into the lounge. Thank you Vianda as you and your team have been most helpful to me and my family on flights to and from Jakarta this year. The lounge itself is quite large and there were sufficient hot and cold snacks and drinks available and there was service team members on hand if required. Boarding the plane was from Gate 13 which is very close to the lounge, therefore only a short walk. Boarding was called by seat class and seat number and was very orderly. I took my seat and was offered a selection of cold soft drinks, then after take off I was offered a selection of two meals and/or a sandwich. All three sections of food and drinks were more than sufficient for a flight of less than 4 hours. The cabin crew were very courteous and helpful throughout the flight even taking a few minutes to have a chat and asking about my wellbeing. We arrived in Sorong on time, and I had to wait only 12 minutes for my luggage to arrive on the carousel. Overall, a good flight considering it was a red eye flight.

I flew on GA-88 from Jakarta to Amsterdam May 2024. Jakarta airport was quite busy as long holiday weekend; however, I was helped by Nidya from the Garuda First Class Support Team for check in and through security, immigration and into the First-Class lounge. Within the Garuda First Class lounge there are VIP rooms and there offer full meal and drink services, however I chose simple snacks, however the staff were very engaging and helpful. The flight was delayed by 1 hours and 35 minutes due to the late arrival of inbound aircraft, when it came time for boarding, I was assisted by Nidya who escorted me to aircraft door and then I was met by the cabin crew. I was given a very warm welcome by George, Wiwiek, Sang and Chef Angga. I was escorted to my seat by Wiwiek and Sang and offered some soft drinks and some snacks. Thank you for your great service and interaction. I was quite tired, therefore just after take-off I bedded down and had a good 6 ~ 7 hours sleep. When I woke up the cabin crew were on hand to prove hot and cold beverages and they asked if I wanted something more substantial to eat. However, I declined and just said I would wait for breakfast and just had some hot team and biscuits. BTW breakfast would have been prepared anytime, however I waited until 3 hours prior to landing. Throughout the flight the cabin crew were always on hand, however there was some bad turbulence, however the pilot and crew handled this very well and suspended hot drink service, which considering the recent incident on another airline this was very appropriate. For breakfast I ordered an omelet together with a selection of side dishes and this was another great well-prepared meal by the chef onboard and served with tea and other condiments.. Upon arrival in Amsterdam, we met by the VIP Team who took us to the VIP lounge where we went through immigration. This is an outstanding service provide d by Garuda-Indonesia for its First-Class passengers. I then only had to wait 15 minutes to get my luggage and I was on my way. Thank you, Garuda-Indonesia I really appreciate the personal service onboard from the cabin crew and look forward to flying with them again..

So much about this flight was excellent. Unfortunately the food (both main meal and pre landing) were pretty bad. Quality was just not there and with no printed menu choices were not clear and sometimes hard to understand. Now that that is out of the way, I can say everything else was quite good. Seat was roomy and comfortable in all positions, crew was warm and efficient and boarding was easy. The flight left and arrived a few minutes early.The lounge at Haneda (TIAT) was also mediocre and Delta Lounge was not offered which should have been.

I flew on GA-89 from Amsterdam to Jakarta in May 2024. From being picked up from my Hotel in Amsterdam South by a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia to being dropped off at Amsterdam Schiphol airport VIP lounge. I was brought to a special lounge area for Garuda Indonesia passengers. In the lounge all formalities were carried out such as check in and immigration. Within the VIP lounge there are full meal and drink facilities and the service it outstanding. When it came time from board, I was escorted to the aircraft by the Schiphol VIP team via car. This is a great service as it cuts out the long queues at security and immigration. Upon boarding I was given a very warm welcome by the cabin crew Mariska, Fesiti, Agnes, Chef David. I started off with a light meal of caviar and then had the main meal of salmon, which was very well prepared and the represented was outstanding. I then bedded down and had a good 6 hours sleep as the bed and clothing were very comfortable. Throughout the flight the cabin crew were available to service snacks and hot & soft drinks. For breakfast I ordered an omelet together with a selection of side dishes and this was another great meal serves with tea and coffee. Upon arrival in Jakarta, I was met at the aircraft door by the Garuda First Team of Herbert and Nidya who guided me through immigration, luggage collection and out to a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia to take me to my home. Door to door service is outstanding. Thank you, Garuda-Indonesia, for another excellent service. I also loggin to the wi fi service and the connectivity and download speeds were very good,

This was a red-eye midnight flight from Jakarta to Sorong. The flight was about 5 hours. The check-in was quite efficient and the seats were comfortable too. Efficient and courteous crew. The only issue was that the meal offered after boarding was only beef, with no other options, thankfully I had eaten before boarding else would have been ravenous. They also offered another light snack before arrival which was chicken but the food quality was quite disappointing. There was IFE even on the domestic flight with a limited but good collection of movies and serials.

The flight was comfortable with great legroom and in flight entertainment. The cabin crew was friendly and efficient, The first meal served on departure was quite good and filling but the snack offered near arrival was not the best.

Flew on GA-88 Jakarta to Amsterdam in May 2024. From being picked up from my home by a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia to being dropped off at airport where I was met by the Garuda First Class Team Firyal who escorted me through the check in process and on through security, immigration and to the First-Class lounge. When it came time to board, I was escorted to the aircraft my Firyal. Thank you, Firyal for your help and assistance which was much, appreciated. The flight was full in all classes, however the cabin crew upon boarding were very welcoming and extremely helpful throughout the flight. I had a light meal of caviar and then a good 6-hour sleep. Prior to bedding down, I had ordered breakfast with the chef to be served 3 hours prior to landing, however prior to that the cabin crew kept coming around and offering warm and cold drinks and snacks. The chef prepared an omelet to order together with a selection of side dishes. The meal was excellent, and cabin kept coming around topping up tea and coffee. As noted above the cabin was full, however the cabin crew still provided a very high level of service. The crew was made up of Elis, Rika, Cartika and Chef Fandi and they provided excellent service. Upon arrival in Amsterdam, we were met at the aircraft door by Schiphol VIP Team who Garuda-Indonesia using in Amsterdam, and they take you directly to the VIP lounge where you go through immigration, and they then pick up your luggage to check in for onward flight. This is another great service provided by Garuda-Indonesia as it saves time.

Flew on GA863 Hong Kong to Jakarta. While in the queue for check-in I was met by the Garuda Hong Kong base manager Mrs. Mia and her team who assisted me through security, immigration and into the business lounge. The lounge used by Garuda in Hong Kong is the Premier lounge which is more than suitable and they have a reasonable selection of hot and cold drinks and snacks available. When it came time for boarding Mrs. Mia and Ms. Jess assisted me as I needed to use the train to get to the remote gate. When I arrived at the gate, they were getting ready to start boarding and I was allowed to board without any delay. Waiting at the aircraft door was the Senior Cabin Crew Sari Puspita and Daryani who provided with a warm welcome and guided me to my seat. The flight was quite full; however, the cabin crew were extremely friendly and offered drinks and snacks. When it came time for the main meal service Andy the Chef came around and offered me a selection of food and I chose Cod and Mash potatoes, and this was well presented and tasted even better. Throughout the flight other cabin crew members Maya and Eva also provided soft drinks and snacks. Upon arrival in Jakarta, I was met at the Plane door by Garuda PSA Rudy who guided me through immigration, baggage collection and customs. Rudy also helped me get a taxi as it was quite busy. A big thank you to Mrs. Mia and her team in Hong Kong, Rudy in Jakarta and the onboard cabin crew of Sari, Daryani, Maya, Eva, and Chef Andy their service and help is much appreciated.

Flew on GA860 Jakarta to Hong Kong. I was met at checking by the Garuda PSA Team leader Vianda who assisted me with check-in, then escorted me through security, immigration and into the business lounge. Lot of hot and cold food, snacks, and hot and cold drinks were available, however as I was fasting, I did not consume anything. When it came time for boarding Ms. Vianda arranged a buggy to take us to the remote gate and I was able to board at leisure. The cabin crew upon boarding provided gave me a warm welcome and guided me to my seat. The flight was full; however, the cabin crew were extremely friendly and knowing that I was fasting provided me with additional pillows and blankets to ensure that I was comfortable. They also came around several times to ensure that I was fine. Upon arrival in Hong Kong, I was met at the Plane door by Garuda Hong Kong manager Mr. Leonard and his team who guided me through the Skytrain, immigration, baggage collection to my waiting car. A big thank you Mr. Leonard and his team their help was much appreciated as it has been over 5 years since I was in Hong Kong airport. Another wonderful flight on Garuda Indonesia.

Flew on GA-89 Amsterdam to Jakarta March 2024. From being picked up from my hotel in Amsterdam to being dropped off at my home in Jakarta it was a seamless and wonderful experience. Garuda also provides access to the VIP Lounge in Schiphol airport, and this means that all security and immigration formalities are completed in the lounge avoiding long queues. The flight itself was outstanding as I was lucky to have the same crew as on the outbound flight i.e. Yudirsyan, Renny, Chef Gia and Affiriyani and again they were very welcoming and gave an outstanding service throughout the flight. They even catered to my very early breakfast request. I put the service provided on the ground and in the air at 11/10. A big thank you to the GA89 Team.

Flew on GA-88 Jakarta to Amsterdam March 2024. I was picked up from my home by a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia and driven to the Terminal-3 airport where I was met at the curbside by Yudi from the First Class Team who assisted me with my luggage, check-in, fast track through security and immigration and into the First-Class lounge. There was a full a la carte food service available, however I chose the fruit platter. The ambience in the lounge was good and the staff were very helpful. When it came for boarding, I again was assisted by Yudi to the aircraft and door. The flight itself was amazing. The crew of Yudirsyan, Renny, Chef Gia and Affiriyani onboard this flight were very welcoming and gave an outstanding service throughout the flight. The Bathroom was always kept clean by the crew. & Food was delicious. Every time I went to the bathroom, and I came back to my seat, my bed was made up again. I know it was a small gesture, but much appreciated and goes to show the level of service that Garuda provides. This flight is another 10/10. I did use the onboard Wi Fi and it was good and fast as was the connection.

Flew on GA682 Jakarta - Sorong. Upon entering the check-in area, I was met by the Garuda PSA Team leader Vianda who assisted me with check-in, then escorted me through security and into the domestic lounge. There was both warm and cold snacks available in the lounge as well as hot and cold drinks, the lounge team were very helpful in offering snacks, fruits, and drinks during our stay in the lounge. When it came time for boarding myself and colleagues were escorted to the gate by Ma-uf from Garuda PSA Team and boarding was orderly and the plane doors were closed within 15 minutes of boarding commencement. The flight was just over 3 hours 45 minutes; however, we had a long taxi ride to Terminal one runway, however the aircraft took off with the scheduled time frame. The flight was quite full; however, the cabin crew were quite friendly and provided us with a breakfast menu which was quite filling. The cabin crew came around several times offering top ups of hot, cold drinks and bread rolls. We arrived in Sorong on schedule, however had to wait for approx. 20 minutes to obtain my luggage, early morning is Sorong is always busy as there are several flights that land within minutes of each other. Another delightful flight on Garuda Indonesia.

The ground experience is terrible, the Garuda international lounge is dirty. The showers are not cleaned between 2 passengers. The boarding experience is chaotic. Just before boarding the plane we are asked to leave our water bottles at the gate (which does not make any sense as we've already been through security). The cabin crew is unfriendly, the seats and toilets are dirty and the footrest is uncomfortable as it eats your legroom. No comment or excuses from the crew after a 1 hour delay. It seemed to be normal.

Flew on GA683 Sorong – Jakarta. Check in process was fast as most people had already checked in when I arrived. Garuda Indonesia using a local lounge in Sorong, it is large, however has limited snacks and drinks, however the lounge staff are very helpful. When it came time for boarding it was well controlled and people were boarded based on seat row. The flight itself was just over 3 hours 35 minutes and the cabin crew were quite friendly and attentive. They came around several times to top up the hot and cold drinks. When I arrived in Jakarta I was met by Ika and Yudi from Garuda PSA Team and as were the aircraft parked it was long way from the baggage area, they had arranged a car to take me to the terminal. They then helped me obtain my luggage and escorted me to my car. Thank You Ika and Yuda, very much appreciated. What I really like about Garuda Indonesia is their ground and cabin crews as they never cease to amaze me with their truly welcoming smile, and they go out of their way to be very helpful.

Flew on GA682 Jakarta to Sorong and check in was fast and efficient. I was then escorted through security to the Garuda lounge by Yudi from Garuda PSA Team. As it was a late-night flight the lounge was not that busy, however there were sufficient snacks, food and hot and colds drinks available. Boarding was orderly; however, it seems that Garuda lets people board with quite a lot of hand luggage, and I saw some large size cases as well which I believe should have been checked in as they took up too much space in the overhead storage bins. It was an overnight flight; however, the seats were reasonably comfortable. The cabin crew was efficient and welcoming, after takeoff they came around and offered a small meal and some hot & drinks. Not the best, however sufficient. We landed in Sorong on time and baggage came out very quickly. Overall, not a bad flight.

A330 was a really old aircraft. Inflight entertainment is non existent. Movies like Batman, New Years Eve and The Intern were featured. There was not a recent movie and very limited options. Made feedback to the senior crew but she ignored me. Not that good of a service from a 5 star airline.

Flew on GA407 from Denpasar, Bali to Jakarta. I was met at curbside and was assisted by a Garuda PSA Team member who escorted me to the check in desk and then assisted me through security and onto the Garuda lounge, The lounge is reasonable sized and has good selection of local food, snacks, and soft drinks. When it came time for boarding the Garuda PSA was also on hand to escort me to the aircraft. On boarding I was welcomed by the cabin crew and was directed to my seat. There was two selections of food for the lunch time meal, and I was able to mix and match from the two meals. The service was excellent and with the warm Garuda smile. We arrived in Jakarta slightly ahead of schedule, and I was met at the plane door by Firyal from the Garuda PSA Team who assisted me with baggage collection and escorted me to my car. Thank you, Firyal. The service from check in until receiving my luggage in Jakarta was outstanding.

Flew GA402 Jakarta to Denpasar, Bali. The flight was early morning; however, the airport was quite business. At the check in desk, I was assisted by Herbart from Garuda PSA Team who also assisted me though security and into the lounge. When it came time for boarding Herbart was also on hand to assist. The onboard service was excellent and there was a good breakfast selection. I chose the omelet which came with side dishes and condiments. Overall, the meal and drink service was very good. We arrived in Denpasar on schedule, and I was met at the plane door by Davi from the Garuda PSA Team who assisted me with baggage collection and escorted me to my hotel car. Thank you Davi. Another great flight on Garuda Indonesia.

Flew GA875 Tokyo Haneda to Jakarta. The check in process was quite chaotic as there was only a single desk open for all business class which meant long queues building up. Eventually when I finished the check in process, I was given a voucher to access the TIAT Lounge, however upon entering the lounge I was informed that I would have to wait outside as the lounge was full. Therefore, I decided to use my AMEX Card which allows me access to the SKY lounge. When it came time to board, both Business and Economy class passengers were boarded at the same time, however this did not lead to any delays in boarding. When entering the aircraft, the cabin crew gave a warm welcome. The flight itself was uneventful, however the meals offered were very well prepared and with sufficient portions that I just went with a salad and main course both of which were tasty and well presented. We arrived in Jakarta on schedule and when the aircraft door was opened, I was met by Vianda from the Garuda PSA Team who escorted me through immigration, baggage collect, customs and assisted me in getting a taxi. Thank you very much Vianda. My conclusion is that the onboard flight and ground services in Jakarta were outstanding, however these we let down by the long check in times and lack of lounge access in Tokyo Haneda airport. I note that Garuda uses a local company at Haneda to help with the check in process, however that should not be an excuse.

Poor communication with passengers regarding issues, digital check in infrastructure broke down resulting in long check in lines lasting hours without sufficient communication with passengers waiting in line. In-flight accommodation and entertainments are sufficient but does not stand out in any way. A mediocre airline at best. Definitely lower than standard for a national airline for such a big country.

Flew GA874 Jakarta to Tokyo Haneda overnight flight. Check in was quite fast and I was then escorted through security, immigration and into the Garuda lounge. This was a great fast-track service. The Garuda lounge was quite comfortable, and there was a very good selection of food, snacks, and drinks available, and the lounge staff were very attentive. When it came time to board, I was assisted by Ryan from the Garuda PSA team who help provide a buggy to take me to the remote area of the airport from where to board the aircraft. At the gate I was allowed to board right away. The Garuda cabin crew gave me a very warm welcome and guided me to my seat. As it was an overnight flight, I tried to get some sleep, however when awoke and went to the toilet, I was met by the cabin crew and Chef Erwin who presented me with a birthday cake. It was a very pleasantly surprised and I really appreciate the effort of the crew to recognize that it was my birthday and to prepare the cake, therefore I would like to thank the business class cabin crew made up of Budi Handoko, Ellyza, Ayu, Zulfa and Chef Erwin who really made my day by proving this small, but significant gesture. I have been flying for over 45 years and many times on my birthday, however this is the first time that this has happened. When it came for breakfast, I was treated with a very good selection of food, and I chose the omelet that was garnished with a good selection of side dishes. Upon arrival in Haneda I was met at the plane door by and escorted through immigration, customs and out to the taxi. I very much appreciate all the help, assistance and especially the birthday cake onboard. Thank you very much Garuda-Indonesia.

Flew on GA-89 Amsterdam to Jakarta December 30th. I was picked up at my hotel by a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia and driven to the VIP Center at Schiphol airport. In the VIP Center they take care of all check in and immigration procedures without me having to leave the VIP Lounge. This is an outstanding service provided by Garuda-Indonesia. The aircraft was parked in a remote area; however, I was driven to the aircraft by the VIP Center car and was allowed to board immediately. I was welcomed at the aircraft door by the cabin crew with the warm welcoming Garuda-Indonesia smile. After takeoff there was large selection of food on offer from starters, main course, deserts, and cheese board. I opted for the main course only and chose salmon. The salmon was well presented and tasted savory. I then chose to rest, and the cabin crew made up the bed. I had a good rest, and when I woke up the cabin crew were on hand to serve snacks and hot and cold drinks. With less than three hours to landing the onboard chef offered a cooked breakfast. I chose an omelet which was garnished with sausage, tomatoes etc. Anoth great meal. The service from boarding in Amsterdam to landing in Jakarta was exceptional from the team made up of Ely Siswanto, Maria Dewi, Desti and Chef Erwin. The cabin crew was excellent and provided an outstanding service. What I really love about Garuda-Indonesia is their consistency in the service they provide both on the ground and in the air, they are true professionals and the SKYTRAX 2023 best cabin crew definitely holds true. We arrived in Jakarta 23 minutes ahead of schedule and I was met at the aircraft door by Vianda from the First-Class Ground staff who helped guide me through immigration, baggage collection, customs and out to a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia to take me to my home. Thank you to all on those that served on this GA89 flight both on the ground and in the air, for another excellent flight on Garuda-Indonesia.

Flew on GA-88 Jakarta to Amsterdam. I was picked up at my home by a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia. I was then met at the curb side at the airport and was assisted to the check in area, through immigration and into the First-Class lounge. During this process I was assisted from curb side through to boarding the aircraft by Ms. Vianda. Thank you Vianda your help, assistance and professionalism was much appreciated. The onboard service was outstanding from the team made up of Percy Siegers, Vivik, Annisaa and Chef Fredi Saputra. The cabin crews’ eye for detail was exceptional and they were on hand throughout the flight and provided an outstanding service with their personal touch. We arrived in Amsterdam a little behind schedule due to strong headwinds, however I had more than sufficient time to catch my connecting flight. In Amsterdam airport Garuda-Indonesia using the VIP Center who picks you up from the aircraft and takes to the VIP lounge and then to my connecting flight. This is another great service provided by Garuda-Indonesia Thank you, Garuda-Indonesia, for another outstanding flight.

Flew on GA-683 Sorong – Jakarta, although the flight was full the check in process was quite quick and the staff were very friendly. There is a small lounge in Sorong that Garuda Indonesia uses. The lounge has a limited selection of food and snacks, however sufficient for short stay. When it came time for boarding, there was a long queue, however the boarding process was managed well. I had pre-order a diabetic meal and after takeoff the cabin crew came and asked when I wanted to eat. The diabetic meal served was quite savory and it was served with hot and cold drinks. The cabin crew of Tarmizal Indra and Tiara Veroosta where very helpful and were on hand throughout the flight. Thank you both for a great service. When I landed in Jakarta, I was meet at the plane door by Hardi from Garuda Premium Services and he helped and assisted me obtaining my luggage. Thank you Hardi. Overall, an excellent service.

Flew on GA-683 Sorong – Jakarta, although the flight was full the check in process was quite quick and the staff were very friendly. There is a small lounge in Sorong that Garuda Indonesia uses. The lounge has a limited selection of food and snacks, however sufficient for short stay. When it came time for boarding, there was a long queue, however the boarding process was managed well. I had pre-order a diabetic meal and after takeoff the cabin crew came and asked when I wanted to eat. The diabetic meal served was quite savory and it was served with hot and cold drinks. The cabin crew of Tarmizal Indra and Tiara Veroosta where very helpful and were on hand throughout the flight. Thank you both for a great service. When I landed in Jakarta, I was meet at the plane door by Hardi from Garuda Premium Services and he helped and assisted me obtaining my luggage. Thank you Hardi. Overall, an excellent service.
Excellent service, always pleasant to fly with Garuda Indonesia. I strongly recommend this service. Very polite crew and friendly. Garuda is one of the best companies.

Flew on GA-682 Jakarta to Sorong. I was able to check-in at the SKY Priority area and the check in staff were most helpful and I was then escorted to the Garuda lounge, were there was a good selection of food, snacks, and soft drinks. The lounge was very quiet as it was late at night, however there were sufficient staff around to assist. When it came time for boarding, I was escorted to the plane and was able to board right away.. The flight was full, however there was a meal service with two choices, and this was served with hot and cold drinks. Additionally, prior to landed they was another snack provided with a choice of hot and cold drinks. The overall quality of food was more than satisfactory. We arrived in Sorong on time and baggage was delivered within 15 minutes of landing and I more than sufficient time to catch my connecting flight. Overall service was very good, and I appreciate the help and assistance of both cabin crew Eri Andiyana and Efweny Septahaty

My flight to Jakarta was to use up a Covid flight credit. I had originally booked a direct flight from Melbourne to Jakarta, months later I was rebooked to a flight Via Denpasar (Bali). I completed online check in but, was unable to print my boarding pass. Once i arrived the airport check in was efficient. Melbourne to Denpasar was an older aircraft with signs of aging showing. Seats comfortable as my meal was very tasty and the crew friendly and efficient. I found the transfer in Bali to be very confusing! No clear signage and no domestic recheck counter. Denpasar to Jakarta brand new A330 neo. Boarding was chaotic as the sign for the row numbers was held way out of sight for people at the back of line, Instead of walking along the line to assist with boarding. Aircraft was brand new with great seats and a fantastic Business product, Meal was very tasty and Crew were very nice. I hope that the A330 neo will be deployed on the Australia routes. They would have a superior product to their competitors. App and website need a serious update as well as the transfer procedures in Denpasar. I will probably fly Garuda again and I hope to see their new cabins to Australia soon!

Flew on GA-407 Denpasar to Jakarta. I was met at the departure curb side by Garuda Premier Class representative Qulan, and he help and assisted me to check-in, however based on my ticket my pre-booked seat assigned was 6K, however at the check in desk it was changed to 7K without any explanation. I requested an explanation, however, did not get any creditable explanation. If it was operational reasons that is all they had to say, and I would have accepted. Eventually I was escorted to the lounge although small it is clean and had sufficient snacks and drinks available and the team in the lounge were extremely helpful. When it came time for boarding Qulan escorted me through security and on to the plane. The flight was full, however there was only two choices of food available, and both were rice. I don’t like rice, however there was no alternative, therefore I just had a soft drink. Upon arrival in Jakarta, I was met at the gate by Fira from the Garuda Premier Team and escorted to the baggage area. Thank you, Fira, and best wishes, on your up coming wedding. I really appreciate your help and assistance. Overall service was good; however, my seat being changed without an explanation was a low point.

Flew on GA402 from Jakarta to Denpasar as the flight is an early morning departure, however Garuda-Indonesia check-in desks are always open. In the priority check-in area I was assisted by Heibert from the Garuda-Indonesia ground support staff who help check me in and then escorted me through security and into the VIP Lounge. The boarding gate was very close to the lounge and when it came time for boarding, I was again assisted by Heibert who escorted me to the plane door. I was given a warm welcome by the Garuda cabin crew and was escorted to my seat. The flight was full, however the cabin crew as usual were quite helpful and friendly. There were three choices for breakfast, however as I had some food in the lounge I went with a light snack with tea, We arrived in Denpasar 19 minutes ahead of schedule and I was meet at the aircraft door by Garuda premium service team member Sony who escorted me to the baggage area and on to my car. If people read my reviews, they may think it is cut and paste review, however Garuda-Indonesia really keeps providing a consistent high level of excellent service both on the ground and in the air.

I recently enjoyed a pleasure flight, and I must say that the service truly stood out as the most remarkable aspect of my journey. It's no surprise that Garuda Indonesia was awarded as The World's Best Cabin Crew. The attentiveness and professionalism of cabin crew made the experience enjoyable and memorable. Starting with the positive aspects, the welcome drink and bottle of water provided on the ground were appreciated. However, including a small sweet treat, such as a piece of candy or some snacks, would have added a delightful touch to the welcome service. On this flight, I requested a seafood meal. The first service commenced approximately 25 minutes after take-off, during which a starter of salmon tart was served. Before the lights were turned out, which was approximately an hour after take-off, the second service began. I received a tuna sandwich as a light snack or an in-between course. One of the cabin crew accidentally offered me a regular meal, and I opted for the chicken pie, resulting in my receiving two snacks. Despite this, it enhanced my dining experience satisfaction. In terms of the meal schedule, I suggest serving a hot meal during the light snack or in-between course service, not just during breakfast or the pre-landing meal. This adjustment would provide passengers with a satisfying dinner option and contribute to a more comfortable journey pace. Approximately halfway through the journey, juice service was provided. Integrating the light snack or in-between course during the juice service, midway through the flight, could better align with passengers' hunger levels and create a more seamless dining experience. About an hour and 50 minutes prior to landing, breakfast or a pre-landing meal was served, which consisted of appetizers and a hot meal. For the appetizer, I received mixed fruit, yogurt, a bread roll accompanied by strawberry jam and butter. For the hot meal, I was served stir-fry noodles with sweet and sour seafood. Overall, my journey with Garuda Indonesia was made truly memorable by the outstanding service and thoughtful meal offerings.

Flew on GA823 from Singapore to Jakarta. Check in was in Changi Terminal-3, however the aircraft departed from Terminal-1, therefore there was long walk to change terminals and use the Skytrain. As GA823 flight is an early morning departure check in opened at 05:15am. There was one business class check-in desk open, however I would say that the check-in staff was not very friendly in fact a little abrupt and not your typical Garuda-Indonesia warm service, however I note that Garuda-Indonesia uses a 3rd party service company in Singapore. The boarding gate was at Gate 26 Terminal which is right at the end of the Terminal. Security was reasonable and fast, when it came time for boarding the process was acceptable. The flight itself was good and the cabin crew quite helpful and very friendly. There was three choices food being offered and I chose the omelet, and it was served by tea and soft rolls and was more that acceptable. We arrived in Jakarta ahead of schedule and I was meet at the aircraft door by Garuda premium service team who escorted to the baggage area and through customs and on to my car . Garuda-Indonesia keeps providing a consistent high level of service; however, I would recommend that they speak with their service Company in Singapore to be a little more friendly at the check-in counters.

Flew on GA683 from Sorong to Jakarta. The flight is scheduled for early morning departure and the flight left on time and arrived in Jakarta ahead of schedule. Sorong airport gets quite busy early morning as there are many departures. There are two Garuda check-in desks and the check-in staff we quite friendly. When it came time for boarding the process was organized as they were boarded from both the front and rear of the aircraft. There is a lounge in Sorong that Garuda Business Class passengers can use. The lounge is small and is not operated by Garuda, however the lounge team were quite helpful even though there are limited snacks available, however there was Coffee, Tea, and some soft drinks available. The flight was good and the cabin crew quite helpful and very friendly. I had ordered a special meal, and I was informed I could have the meal anytime I wanted after take-off. The meal and soft drinks available were more than sufficient. We arrived in Jakarta ahead of schedule and I was meet at the aircraft door by Roy from Garuda premium service team who escorted to the baggage area. My baggage was delivered very quickly. Garuda-Indonesia keeps providing a consistent high level of service.

The service truly stood out as the most remarkable aspect of my journey.  The attentiveness and professionalism of cabin crew made the experience enjoyable and memorable. Upon taking my seat, the crew handed me a warm towel and offered a welcome drink. I chose a glass of champagne. Additionally, a bottle of water and amenity kits were placed on my seat. The first service included a snack (mixed nuts), which I received about 25 minutes after take-off. During the flight, I requested a special seafood meal. The second service (entree) commenced approximately an hour after take-off, consisting of king prawns with vermicelli noodles and mixed veggies. A bread roll and butter were also served on the entree tray. A suggestion for improvement is for Garuda to use pure butter instead of canola spread. The third service (main course) was served around 2 hours after take-off, featuring a hot meal of rice with sweet & sour seafood mix and cap cay. A dessert, mango pudding, was also included on the main course tray. I strongly recommend serving the dessert separately from the main course, while placing the bread on the entree tray and the side dishes on the main course tray. This approach allows passengers to fully savor each dish, enhancing the overall dining experience on your flights. After finishing the main course, a crew member offered me tea/coffee while I enjoyed the dessert. I opted for a cup of tea, which came with a mini chocolate bar. Approximately 2-3 hours before landing, sweet and savory snacks were offered, along with a beverage service. An hour prior to landing, a pre-landing snack and a final beverage service were served. The snack consisted of a salmon & cucumber sandwich with seaweed-flavored chips. Another area for improvement is the amenity kits. The amenity kits included: - A dental kit with a toothbrush and toothpaste. - Earplugs and an eye mask for a good night's sleep. - Plush socks and a cozy, high-quality blanket. - A curated selection of magazines and a tablet loaded with the latest movies and TV shows. Amenity kits that were missing or should have been included: - High-end skincare products, including moisturizer, lip balm, and facial mist. - Dental floss. - A neck pillow that provides excellent support for relaxation. - A stylish pen and notebook for jotting down thoughts. - Noise-Canceling headphones for enjoying in-flight entertainment. - Tissues and wet wipes for convenience.

Flew on GA682 from Jakarta to Sorong. The flight is scheduled for departure at 12:10am and is a 4-hour overnight flight. Overall, the check-in, security, and boarding processes were efficient and well organized. I was in the Garuda-Indonesia domestic lounge were there was food, snacks, fruits, Coffee, Tea, and other soft drinks available. The lounge team were also very attentive. The flight itself was good as was the onboard service . The food and refreshments served was more that sufficient for a domestic flight. We arrived in Sorong on schedule and my baggage was delivery very fast so that I was able to go and check in for onward flight. Overall, another satisfying flight on Garuda-Indonesia.

I flew on Garuda-Indonesia onboard GA089 from Amsterdam to Jakarta on October 1st, 2023. I was picked up from my hotel in Amsterdam by a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia and was dropped off at the VIP Center at Schiphol Airport where I was met by the VIP Team who assisted me with check in and immigration formalities. This is a seamless service and a very good way of avoiding all the long Check-In and Security queues. In the VIP lounge, drinks, snacks, and a full menu was available. When it came time for boarding, I was driven to the aircraft. The flight was slighted delayed due to Air Traffic Control restrictions, which meant we took off approx. 1 hour from the schedule departure time, however we landed in Jakarta only 35 minutes late. After take-off, I was provided with a full à la carte menu. I chose a Crayfish Pate for starters and a main course of Salmon. The meals were very well presented and tasty. The seat was comfortable and when it came time for sleeping a full bedding service was provided, and I ended up having over 6 hours of sleep. When I woke up the cabin crew were available to provide drinks and snacks. I ordered breakfast which was served approx. 2.5 hours prior to landing. However, breakfast could have been served at a time of my choosing. The section and quality of food served throughout the flight was excellent. In the first class cabin the team of Willy Wilman, Rachmawati Prihastuti, Ade Masdiah and Chef Ahmad Fauzi were very attentive throughout the flight and their personal touch and friendliness was much appreciated, therefore I would like to thank them all for the outstanding service afforded to me. Upon arrival in Jakarta, I was met at the aircraft door by Vianda from Garuda Frist Class Team who escorted through immigration, customs and on to a waiting car that was provided by Garuda -Indonesia to take me home. Another excellent long-distance flight on Garuda-Indonesia.

I flew on Garuda-Indonesia on GA088 B777-300-ER from Jakarta to Amsterdam in September 2023. I was picked up from my home by a Garuda-Indonesia driver and dropped off at Terminal-3 where I was greeted by the Garuda First Class Ground team who helped me check in, walk me through immigration and into the VIP lounge. In the first-class lounge, drinks, snacks, and a full pre-boarding menu was available, however I chose fruits only. When it came time for boarding, I was escorted to the aircraft and directly to my seat. After take-off, I was provided with a full à la carte menu. I chose a lite snack as I wanted to get some sleep. The seat and bedding were very comfortable, and the cabin crew were always available to provide drinks and snacks. I order breakfast which was served approx. 3 hours prior to landing. In fact, breakfast could have been served anytime of my choosing. The section and quality of food served for snacks and breakfast was excellent. In the first class cabin the team were very attentive through out the flight and their personal touch was much appreciated and I would like to thank them all for their outstanding service and personnel touch. Upon arrival in Amsterdam, I was met at the plane door by the Schiphol VIP Center team which is part of Garuda Indonesia service. Where I transferred to the VIP lounge to await my connecting flight to London.

The flight from Bali Denpasar to Jakarta was great and good organised. However in the flight from Jakarta to Amsterdam the screen and sound was not working of seat 35A. We switched headset to check if the headset was broken but all headsets gave no sound. So the screen and sound were broken. No movies or music could be watched or listened. We asked the stewardess and after a couple failed restart of the screen we asked if it was possible to change seat. Only one of us could change somewhere else or a person who was a sleep in de first 15 minutes of the flight should be asked to change so we could sit together but they did not want to wake her up. So no indication when she would wake up. After an hour we had to ask if she woke up because of the food round and they said she did not want to change. There was no wifi connection and we paid a lot for the flight and chairs to sit together. With a 13,5 hour flight and no service of a working screen or wifi for this kind of money should at least deserve something in return. We got home safe with baggage but it is not nice that you pay this much without entertainment service which should be included.

Flew on GA-402 Jakarta - Denpasar. Check in was quite fast as it was an early morning flight. After check-in I was then escorted by Mr. Noval to the Garuda lounge. In the lounge breakfast was being served as well tea, coffee, together with juices and other snacks. The Staff in lounge were quite helpful and the lounge is itself was very clean and here was sufficient space to find somewhere to sit. There is a fast free Wi-Fi and log on details are located throughout the lounge. When it came time for boarding Novel escorted me to the gate. The flight itself was an early morning flight and was full. There was full meal service onboard, and I chose the omelette together with tea. The overall food quality and service was quite good. We arrived in Denpasar a little behind schedule however it was not an inconvenience. I was met at the aircraft door by Garuda PSA Team member Mr. Sony who escorted me to the baggage area. I collected my baggage and was on my way within 10 minutes after landing. That is some service. Garuda-Indonesia consistently provides a very high and consistent level of service.

Flew on GA 863 Sorong to Jakarta, the flight. The inbound flight was slightly delayed due to bad weather conditions in Sorong, and this had a knock-on effect, however Garuda was able to carry out a fast and safe turn around. The flight was full, and I am amazed how 3 members of the economy cabin team could serve all passengers, however they did very it very efficiently. The cabin crew polite and professional. Overall good flight and service.

Flew on GA862 Jakarta to Sorong and the check in experience was good and the Garuda ground support team were very helpful, and escorted me through security via the SKY Priority Lane to the lounge. In the lounge there were food and snacks together with soft drinks, tea, and coffee. The lounge was clean as were the toilets. When it came for boarding, I was provided with a buggy as the gate was some distance from the lounge. The boarding experience was quick and friendly, and I was shown to my seat. As it is an overnight flight snacks were offered within 30 minutes of take-off. The flight itself was uneventful, however the cabin crew were most helpful when called upon.

Garuda Indonesia service is back! Had a very pleasant experience from check in until landing. The Cabin Crew was extremely nice and charming. The food on board just normal, not so bored and not so fancy, but the taste is delicious. However, they need to improve or update the AVOD. The movie and the music is old and too few.

Garuda Indonesia changed our 5h direct flight to a 9h flight with a stopover with little notice for both directions of the flight. Had we known in advance we would have gone with a different airline as the point of paying for a direct flight is to fly directly to the destination. This was in both directions.

Flew on GA-089 from Amsterdam to Jakarta. I know that I regularly write about Garuda-Indonesia, however I was lucky to have flown with the same crew as the inbound flight. The service on Garuda-Indonesia is always good however on the outboard flight there was something I had never notices before. Every time you left your seat weather to go the toilet or somewhere else the crew always adjusted you seat and ensure that the seat belt was reset correctly. It is such a small gesture, but remarkable that the cabin crew even though about carrying out such a function. Check in was very good and then I proceeded to the Schiphol VIP center which Garuda-Indonesia provide a spart of their First-Class service. It is an outstanding service. Upon boarding the aircraft, you get the same outstanding Garuda-Indonesia welcome. Service throughout the fight was excellent. The meals servred onboard were outstanding by Pak Andi teh Chef onboard. On up arrive in Jakarta I was meet at the aircraft door by both Nidya and Fauzy who guided me through Immigration and customs. I would like to say I big thank you to both of you. I really appreciate the service that you both provided.

I flew on Garuda-Indonesia on GA088 from Jakarta to Amsterdam in July 2023. I was pick up from my home by Garuda-Indonesia driver and dropped off at Terminal-3 where I was greeted by the Garuda PSA Ground team who helped me check in, get through immigration and into the lounge. In the first-class lounge, drinks, snacks, and full pre-boarding menu was available, however I chose fruits only. When it came time to board, I was escorted to the aircraft. After takeoff, the chef provided me with a menu, however as I wanted to sleep, therefore I chose a lite snack. I was able to get a good 6 hours sleep and the cabin crew were always available to provide drinks and snacks. I order breakfast which was served approx. 3 hours prior to landing. In fact, breakfast could have been served anytime of my choosing. The section of food for breakfast was quite good. In the first class cabin the team of Vvi Dewi, Afrodita, Chef Andi Susanto and Prisila were very attentive through out the flight and their personal touch was much appreciated and I would like to thank them for their outstanding service. Upon arrival in Amsterdam, I was met at the plane door by the Schiphol VIP Center team which is part of Garuda Indonesia service. Where I transferred to the VIP lounge to await my connecting flight.

Flew GA-823 Singapore to Jakarta. I checked in in Terminal-3, however I had to go to Terminal-1 for boarding. The good thing in Changi airport is that the Skytrain is quite fast, therefore no issues getting between terminals. Check in was ok, however it would have been good to have received a response to my good morning. The check-in staff in Singapore are not Garuda-Indonesia staff and that shows by their attitude. Boarding the aircraft was good and orderly. The cabin crew were very welcoming upon boarding and was they directed to my seat. We pulled back from the gate on schedule and was airborne soon after. After takeoff, the cabin crew offered a selection of food and hot drinks for breakfast, and I chose the scrambled eggs. The meal was well presented and tasted good. We landed in Jakarta 15 minutes ahead of schedule, where I was met at the gate by a Garuda ground team who escorted me through immigration and on to the baggage carousel to collect my baggage. I was then escorted through customs and out to my car. Another good flight on Garuda-Indonesia

Flew on GA-683 Sorong to Jakarta. Check in was quite fast even though only two desks were open. I then proceeded to the local lounge used by Garuda-Indonesia. In the lounge soft drinks, tea, coffee, and snacks were provided. It is a small lounge; however, the staff are very helpful. When it came time for boarding the process was fast and efficient which allowed us to take off on time. The flight itself was a morning flight and took approx. 3 hours and 35 minutes. I had ordered a diabetic meal which was promptly served to me just after take-off. The cabin crew were very helpful, and they showed that they really do care about their passengers even for short flight they provided a meal and then before landing a snack.. We arrived in Jakarta right on schedule and I was met at the gate by Garuda PSA Team member was escorted to baggage area. I collected my baggage and was on my way 15 minutes after landing. That is excellent service. Overall, another good flight on Garuda-Indonesia.

Flew on GA-682 Jakarta to Sorong. I was able to check in at the SKY Priority desk and I was quickly escorted by the Garuda PSA Team member Yudi through security and into the Lounge. Soft drinks and snacks were provided in the lounge and staff were very helpful. When it came time for boarding Yudi also escorted me to the aircraft. Thank you Yudi, much appreciated. The flight itself was an overnight flight and was quite full, however the cabin crew managed to serve a meal and soft drinks and overall, they were very helpful and engaging in the typical warm and friendly Garuda-Indonesia way. We arrived in Sorong on time, and it took approx. 15 minutes for my baggage to come out, considering that early morning in Soring is very busy as many airlines arrive with 30 minutes of each other I found this a very acceptable time to wait. Overall, another good flight on Garuda-Indonesia.

After takeoff we were provided with a selection of meals, the food was prepared onboard by Chef Yudi, and it was very well presented with very good portions. We had two full meals onboard during our long flight, and the cabin crew were available throughout the flight to provide drinks and snacks if required. The cabin crew were every attentive to me and my family including my two children. The crew were very professional and very engaging and ensuring that we felt comfortable. I would rate the overall experience as excellent and would like to thank the cabin crew Herry, Renny, Annisaa and Chef Yudi for their help and service to my family and I, they certainly made us feel at home. Upon arrival in Jakarta, we were met at the gate by the Garuda-Indonesia ground support team who escorted us through fast-track immigration and customs. Garuda had also provided me with ground transportation to take us home. However, one area of improvement is that I would recommend that Garuda restarts providing hand towels for freshening up as these are much better that the hand wipe tissues currently provided.

My family and I flew on Garuda Indonesia on GA088 from Jakarta to Amsterdam in June 2023. On arrival at Jakarta Terminal-3 the Garuda ground support team were waiting to help and assist us with our luggage and check-in. After checking in we were escorted through immigration and into the lounge. Drinks, snacks, and full pre-boarding menu was available . When it time came for boarding, we were escorted to the aircraft. After takeoff, the chef provided us with a very good selection of meals, when the food arrived as each meal was prepared by the Chef onboard it was very well presented and tasted even better. We had two full meals onboard additionally the cabin crew were available throughout the flight offering snacks and hot and cold drinks. The First-Class cabin is very comfortable and when it came time to sleep my family and I had a good rest. The cabin crew were very attentive to me, my wife and two children. Nothing was any bother for them, and they always greeted us with a re-assuring heartwarming Garuda-Indonesia smile. I recently read that Garuda-Indonesia on June 20th, 2023, was awarded the Best Cabin Crew 2023 and I would fully endorse this as they were outstanding on our flight. Therefore, I would like to thank the Garuda-Indonesia Cabin crew Margaretha Bernadette, Mardiana, Ade Kurniawan, Nesyanti for their help and assistance to me and my family, they certainly made us feel at home. Upon arrival in Amsterdam, we were met at the plane door by the Schiphol VIP Center team which is part of Garuda Indonesia service. We transferred to the VIP lounge to await our connecting flight. Wi-Fi is available onboard, however it is expensive for 250Mb limit.

Flew on GA-407 Denpasar to Jakarta. I was met at the departure gate curb side by Garuda Premier Class representative Qulan and he help and assisted me to check-in and then through security and on to the Garuda Lounge. The lounge although small was clean and had sufficient snack and drinks available the team in the lounge were very helpful. When it came time for boarding Qulan escorted me through security and on to the plane. The flight was full as it was a long holiday weekend, however the cabin crew offered food and drinks, which we tasty and the cabin crew were very attentive especially Yanti and Vitara. Upon arrival in Jakarta, I was met at the gate by Vianda from the Garuda Premier Team and escorted to the baggage area. Thank you Vianda I really appreciate your help and assistance.

Flew on GA-402 Jakarta to Denpasar and was able to check in at the Business Class check in area and was helped and assisted by the Garuda ground support team. I was then escorted through security and to the business class lounge. When it came time for boarding, Ika from the Garuda ground support team escorted to the gate. The flight was full, however the cabin crew offered breakfast, however I declined as I already had something to eat prior to boarding. The flight itself was good and I did not encounter any issues. Upon arrival in Denpasar, I was met at the gate by the Garuda premier team and escorted to the baggage area. Overall, another good flight on Garuda Indonesia.

Flew on GA-863 Sorong to Jakarta. I was assisted upon arrival in Sorong airport by the Garuda support team. The check in process was fast and efficient. I was then escorted through security and to the lounge by ground staff. When it came time for boarding, the team helped me through the gate check in process and onto the aircraft. The flight was quite full, however the cabin crew managed well. I had ordered a diabetic meal the cabin crew informed me early in the flight that I could have my meal anytime. When it was provided it tasted quite good. The flight time was 3 hours and 39 minutes and we landed in Jakarta on time. Upon arrival I was met by the Garuda ground staff who assisted me in getting my baggage. Overall, a good flight, and the cabin crew were very helpful and kept coming around and asking if I need any additional snacks and soft drinks.

Flew on GA-862 Jakarta to Sorong. The check in process was excellent and the check in team were very polite. I was then escorted through security and immigration to the lounge by Premium Team member. When it came time for boarding, I was escorted to the aircraft. The flight was quite full, and the cabin crew were quite busy, I was offered some meals, however there was only two choices, and both were rice, therefore I did not take the food offered. The flight took off a little behind schedule, however landed in Sorong on time. It took some time for the baggage to come out which surprised me as normally in Sorong it comes out quite quickly. Overall, not a bad overnight flight, however cabin crew could have been a little more engaging.

I flew on Garuda Indonesia GA089 from Amsterdam to Jakarta. Flying Garuda Indonesia First Class you get direct access to the VIP Center at Schiphol airport, and they handle all check-in requirements including security, immigration. This is a seamless process from entering the VIP center until you are taken to board the plane. This is a great service that Garuda affords its First-Class passengers and enhances their status as a Five Star Airline. After take-off I was provided with a selection of meals, the food was prepared onboard by Chef Marcel, and it was very well presented and tasted even better. We had two full meals onboard, and the cabin crew were available throughout the flight and kept around asking if I needed anything else. The cabin crew were very attentive to me, and nothing was any bother to them, and they always greeted us with a re-assuring heart-warming smile. I would rate the overall service as excellent and would like to thank the cabin crew Wawan, Putri, Dea and Chef Marcel for their help and service to me, they certainly made me feel at home. Upon arrival in Jakarta, I was met at the gate by the ground support team who escorted me through immigration and customs. Garuda had also provided me with ground transportation to take me to my home. However, on an area of improvement I would recommend that Garuda restarts providing hand towels for freshening up as these are much better that the hand wipe tissues currently provided.

Overall, I was impressed with the level of service and attention to detail. The seats were comfortable and the cabin was clean. Additionally, the in-flight entertainment system was easy to use. From the check-in counter to the cabin crew, everyone was courteous and helpful. I felt that the safety of passengers was a top priority. However, during first service, the snack was disappointing. Potentially because I requested special meal "Hindu Non Vegetarian". I only received an apple, while the others received lukewarm bread roll with a meat filling. Fortunately, the second service was delicious. Bonus points for offering real cutlery in economy class. It was a pleasant experience. They only have to elevate their food and beverage service by offering more frequent and bigger portions/tray. In addition, offering snacks in between would be greatly appreciated.

They deserve the 5 stars. I was satisfied with their ground service, cabin service, food and beverage was good and the cabin crew hospitality was awesome. The only thing I would say is they should just drop the mask requirement for cabin crew so that we can see their lovely smiles, as we are over covid.

Flew on GA89 Amsterdam-Jakarta. For First Class passengers check in is at the VIP Lounge were all facilities such as check in, immigration is carried out. This is a great service as there is no need for queuing to check in. When time for boarding the VIP Team escort you to the plane by car to the airline steps. The First-Class cabin crew, which was made up of Yuli Asis, Mikaela, Rahayu and Chef Fandi provided excellent service throughout the flight. Additionally, I was offered two main meals and there was a very good menu selection. There was also a good selection snacks and drinks available throughout the flight. On arrival in Jakarta, I was met by Vivanda from Frist Class Team who escorted me through immigration, customs and out the car provided by Garuda to take me home. Another great flight on Garuda Indonesia.

Flew on GA-828 Jakarta to Singapore. The check in process was excellent and the check in team were very polite. I was then escorted through security and immigration to the lounge by Premium Team member Fifi. When it came time for boarding Fifi also escorted me to the aircraft. The cabin crew were on hand throughout the flight, however as I was fasting, I did not take the offer of food. The flight took off on time and landed in Singapore 20 minutes ahead of schedule. Upon arrival in Singapore, I was met by Garuda ground staff who escorted me through immigration, baggage collection and to my taxi. Thank you, Garuda Indonesia, for another excellent flight.

I flew with Garuda Indonesia from Jakarta to Singapore return. I booked this flight a month in advance. The flight to Singapore on went smooth without delay or any problems. The Female Flight attendant who served meal was polite and professional. The meal was mee goreng and was a decent meal. The plane arrived on Time . The flight from Singapore to Jakarta on was the opposite. The Female Flight Attendant was impolite and unfriendly towards me. My meal was bad (pad thai). The plane arrived about 10 minutes late.

Flew on GA-682 Jakarta to Sorong on the overnight flight. The check in process was good even though I was in Economy Class, however Garuda allowed me to check in at the Business Class counter. Due to being a Platinum member I was given access to the lounge and Snacks, Tea, Coffee, and soft drinks were freely available. After checking in I was escorted by the Garuda ground staff team member through security and to the lounge. When came time for boarding I was escorted to the plane door. The overall flight and service was good, however as the plane was full the cabin crew were quite busy servicing meals and snacks. I would recommend that Garuda look at the amount of carryon luggage they allow people to bring onboard as some were carrying bags that looked over 20Kg.

Flew on GA407 from Denpasar Bali to Jakarta. I was swiftly checked in by Sony and he then escorted me through security and into the Lounge. Onboard the cabin crew were quite helpful, however there was only two choices of food, and both were rice therefore, I declined. The cabin crew did offer hot and cold drinks during the short flight. The flight arrived in Jakarta 20 minutes ahead of schedule. Upon arrival I was met at the plane door by Octa and Wisnu from the Garuda Premium Team, and they helped me obtain my baggage and escorted me to my car.

GA402 from Jakarta to Denpasar Bali. Jakarta Terminal-3 was quite busy even though it was early morning, however check-in was fast and efficient. I was escorted through security and into the lounge by Ms. Firyal from the Garuda Premium Team ground staff. When it came time to board Ms. Firyal was on hand to help and assist. Onboard the cabin crew were quite busy serving breakfast and there were two choices. I chose the omelet which was quite good and well prepared. The cabin crew kept coming around and offering additional hot and cold drinks throughout the short flight. Although it was a short journey both the ground and cabin crew were very helpful.

Flew GA89 from Amsterdam to Jakarta and from arriving at the airport on my journey and throughout the cabin staff were run off their feet and are a credit to Garuda Indonesia. The cabin crew were very pleasant and accommodating, nothing was too much trouble for them, and the food and drink menu was quite extensive, and the food provided was excellent. I would like to say a big thank you to all the cabin staff Purser Djoko, MDC Mardiana, FA Ayu, and Chef Erick. that delivered great care and devotion. Garuda also provide a free wi-fi onboard and the connectivity was excellent. On arrival in Jakarta, I was met by Eca the First-Class ground staff who escorted me through immigration, collection of my luggage and through customs and on to the waiting car provided by Garuda Indonesia to take me to my accommodation.

I travelled on Garuda Indonesia on GA88 from Jakarta to Amsterdam. Pick up from home to the airport was on time and the ground staff were very pleasant, professional, and eager to assist. Next step on boarding the flight was equally nice with the help of Eca. I would especially like to mention the cabin crew from Purser Yudiana Sari, MDC Eriandini, Iga Dita, and Chef Yudi Mulyadi who introduced themselves to all First-Class passengers and were very attentive throughout the flight. I didn’t eat at first as I wanted to get some sleep as it was an overnight flight, however there was a good selection of food for breakfast and the presentation and taste was excellent overall a great experience. I also noticed some improvements in the First Class onboard which was refreshing. Additionally the free Wi-Fi connectivity was very good.

Flew on the GA863 from Sorong to Jakarta. Check in and boarding process was well organised. Got the usual warm Garuda welcome when boarding. I ordered a special meal and I had no need to remind the cabin crew as it was presented to me when they were serving the meals. I have flown Garuda many times, mainly in premium class, however I was impressed by the service provided in economy class and the cabin crew came around several times offering soft drinks, tea and coffee. Overall good flight and service.

Flew on GA89 Amsterdam-Jakarta. For First Class passengers check in is at the VIP Lounge were all facilities such as check in, immigration is carried out. This is a great service as there is no need for queuing to check in. When time for boarding the VIP Team escort you to the plane. As it was an overnight flight and going through many time zones the captain gave announcement over India welcoming in the new year and wishing all passengers a Happy New Year the cabin crew and passengers happily welcomed in the New Year The First-Class cabin crew, which was made up of Vivi, Sentry, Cherlida, and the Chef Deni provided excellent service throughout the flight. Additionally, I was provided with two main meals and there was a very good menu selection. There was also a good selection snacks and drinks available throughout the flight. On arrival in Jakarta, I was met by Eca from Frist Class Team who escorted me through immigration, customs and out the car provided by Garuda to take me home. I also met Pak Akbar manager from the Ground support Team. Thank you, Pak Akbar. Another great flight on Garuda Indonesia and Happy New Year and success to Garuda Indonesia and their team both in the air and on the ground for 2023.

Flew on GA88 Jakarta-Amsterdam. I was picked up from my home and the Garuda team were waiting for me at the entrance to the airport and helped check in me in and escorted me through security and immigration. I was then taken to the lounge where I met with Garuda Senior management Pak Irfan, Pak Ade, Ibu Yanti and Pak Akbar. It was good to see the Garuda senior management greeting the passengers and having open discussions you don’t see this with other major airlines. When it came time for boarding, I was escorted to the plane by Eca, and I would like to thank Eca for her help and assistance . The boarding process was well organized. The cabin crew which was made up of Anna, Wanda, Puji, and the Chef ILyasa provided excellent service throughout the flight. Additionally, there was a very good selection of food and snacks available throughout the flight I opted for breakfast only with some minor snacks in between. Free wi-fi was also provided and teh connection was quite good. Overall, another great flight onboard Garuda Indonesia.

Flew on Garuda Indonesia on the GA 405 flight from Denpasar, Bali to Jakarta. I picked up from my hotel by a car provided by Garuda Indonesia and upon arrival at the airport I was meet by Qaulan the First-Class representative who assisted me with check in, security and through to the lounge where I was put in a VIP room, although small it was more than adequate. There was a good selection of food available in the lounge, however I chose to wait until after take-off. Qaulan assisted me when I was boarding and escorted me to the plane, the Garuda Cabin crew were very welcoming, and I knew one of the cabin crew Ruth and she was very helpful during the flight as was Eka. Thank you both for your help and service during the flight. The flight took just over 1 hour and 40 minutes and after landing and when the plane door was opened, I was met by Afrizal from the Jakarta Garuda First Class team who escorted me to the baggage hall and assisted in me in getting my luggage. He then escorted me outside the terminal building to a waiting car that was provided by Garuda Indonesia to take me home. Thank you to Ruth and Eka onboard the flight and Afrizal the ground support staff in Jakarta for providing an excellent service.

Flew on Garuda Indonesia on the GA 408 flight from Jakarta to Denpasar, Bali. During check in I was meet by Garuda First Class and she help and assisted me through the check in process and through security to the Garuda lounge where I was put in a VIP room, although small was it was more than adequate. There was a good selection of food available in the lounge including breakfast and the lounge team were on hand to take my order. Assisted me when boarding and escorted me to the plane, the Garuda Cabin crew were on hand to welcome me and direct me to my seat. After take-off, a choice of 3 meals was offered and I chose to go with a steak, however there was a full 3 course meal presented all tasted good including the starter. The flight took just over 1 hour and 35 minutes and after landing and when the plane door was opened, I was meet by the Denpasar Garuda First Class team who escorted me to the baggage hall and assisted in getting my luggage. He then escorted me outside the terminal building to meet my hotel contacted. In fact, they had contacted the hotel representative in advance to advise them I had landed, therefore I was on my way to the hotel within 15 minutes after landing. Thank you for providing a great service.

Two trips went smoothly. Garuda Indonesia is the most expensive choice for domestic flights in Indonesia. Prices are very suitable for their service and friendliness. Thank you. 2 perjalanan berjalan dengan lancar. Garuda Indonesia merupakan pilihan termahal untuk penerbangan domestik di Indonesia, Harga sangat sesuai dengan pelayanan dan keramahannya. Terima kasih.

High disappointment for the lack of a lounge in Yogyakarta  for business class passengers. I had to wait several hours in the boarding area. They provide a voucher to be spent only in one of the worst coffee shop that is there, who also claimed that the voucher does not allow to receive change.

Flew on Garuda Indonesia on the GA 863 flight from Jakarta to Sorong. Check-in was not so busy as it was after 21:00pm, however the process was quick as I was helped by Herbert from the Garuda ground Priority Team. He then escorted me through security and into the Lounge where I was put in a VIP Room. When boarding was announced Herbert came and escorted me to the plane, the Garuda Cabin crew were on hand to welcome me and direct me to my seat. After takeoff, a choice of two meals was offered, however I chose to try and get some sleep as it is approx. a 4 hour over night flight. The flight itself was good and the stewardess Putri was quite helpful. The flight landed just after 06:15am local time Sorong. My baggage was delivered very quickly, and I was on my way to another flight. Overall, for such a short 4-hour overnight flight it was quite good.

Flew on Garuda Indonesia on GA 89 from Amsterdam to Jakarta. I was picked up at my hotel in Amsterdam by a car provided by Garuda Indonesia. I was taken directly to the VIP center, and they assisted me with check-in and provided me with my boarding pass. The service in the VIP lounge was very good with breakfast and other snacks being served. When the time came to board, we were taken by bus to the plane that was parked in a remote location. The hotel pick up, and lounge service was excellent. When boarding the plane, the Garuda Cabin crew were on hand to welcome us with a warm welcoming Indonesian smile After takeoff we were provided with an extensive menu of multi course meals. The overall choice of meals was excellent, and I chose the salmon which was very well presented and tasted even better. I would like to thank the cabin staff Zelvanya, Pungkisari, Anisa, and Chef Angga for their infight service throughout the flight. They were amazing and very attentive and friendly and were on hand throughout the flight. Upon arrival in Jakarta, I was meet at the gate by the VIP Service team member Viana and escorted via immigration and customs and on to a car provided by Garuda to take me home from the airport. From arrival and getting into the car it took no more that 20 minutes, therefore thank you very much Garuda Indonesia.

Flew on Garuda Indonesia on GA 88 from Jakarta to Amsterdam. I was picked up at my home by a car provided by Garuda Indonesia.
